Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I have been playing KSP for about a year now and I have to say I don't see myself stopping anytime soon. Recently I have been lurking on the forums here and I decided that it is time to make an account.

P.S. Yes I am aware that I am missing an "e" in Krieger.
Hi Dr. Kriger. I have been playing for almost two years, and I'm not tired of it yet. Welcome to the forum.
Welcome aboard! May your stay be pleasant and your adventures grand!

Hi! Welcome to the forums!

I've only been playing for 3-4 months.

Hope you will enjoy your stay here and happy launching!

Welcome

I have been playing for like a year too and I also started using my acount recently. Have fun in the forum

Welcome Dr. Kriger.

Good flights and crashes for you!

Welcome to the Forums!

I've been playing for about 10 months (around a week before i made my account here) and have learned many things through this epic community.
